choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Subject: Notification of Departure
Dear [Boss's Name],
I hope this message finds you well. After careful consideration, I have decided to resign from my position as [Your Position] at [Company Name]. My last day of work will be [Last Day].
Leaving this company has been a difficult decision for me, but I feel it is time for me to move on and pursue new challenges. I want to take this opportunity to express my gratitude for the opportunities and experiences I have gained while working here.
I understand that my departure will leave a void in [Your Department/Team], and I am confident that whoever takes over my position will do an excellent job. Please let me know if there is anything I can do to assist with the transition process.
Thank you again for all of your guidance, support, and mentorship throughout my time here. I wish you continued success in [Company Name]'s future endeavors.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
